stories.title: The Lighthouse
stories.author: Adventure Engine
stories.description: A mysterious light beckons from an abandoned shore. What secrets does the old lighthouse hold?

stories.title: The Defector
stories.author: Adventure Engine
stories.description: A Russian asset wants out. You have 48 hours to extract them from Moscow before the FSB closes in.

stories.title: The Man on the Bench
stories.author: Adventure Engine
stories.description: A chance encounter with a kind old man in the park. But some people aren't what they seem.

stories.title: The Last Signal
stories.author: Adventure Engine
stories.description: Your ship intercepts a distress call from a vessel that disappeared 200 years ago. You're the only one close enough to respond.
